Name: SCV
Description:
Basic worker unit. Can gather resources, build Terran structures, and repair.

Can attack ground units.

Root.Tooltip: Orders selected units to move to the target area or follow the target unit. Moving units will not engage enemies.
Root.Name: Move

Root.Tooltip: Orders selected units to cancel all orders and stop moving.
Root.Name: Stop

Root.Tooltip: Orders selected units to stay where they are and attack enemies that are within range. Units will neither chase down enemies nor move to engage.
Root.Name: Hold Position

Root.Tooltip: Orders selected units to move to the target point, fighting nearby enemies along the way. Targeting a unit with the Attack command orders that it be attacked until it is destroyed.
Root.Name: Attack

Root.Tooltip: Orders selected units to patrol between their current position and the target area. Units will attack enemies and move to engage nearby enemies.
Root.Name: Patrol

Root.Tooltip: Restores life to mechanical units and structures at the cost of resources.
Root.Name: Repair

Root.Tooltip: Orders SCV to gather resources from a selected Mineral Field or Vespene Geyser.
Root.Name: Gather

Root.Tooltip: Returns the carried resources to the nearest drop-off point.
Root.Name: Return Cargo

Root.Tooltip: Halts construction of this structure. The partial construction will remain.
Root.Name: Halt

Root.Tooltip: Orders the unit to apply your currently selected spray to the terrain at the target location.
Root.Name: Spray

TBl1.Tooltip:
Primary structure. Used to receive gathered resources. Can use the Lift Off ability.

Enables:
- SCVs
TBl1.Name: Build Command Center

TBl1.Tooltip: Built over a Vespene Geyser to allow harvesting of vespene gas.
TBl1.Name: Build Refinery

TBl1.Tooltip: Drops the current order without performing it, and allows you to select a different order.
TBl1.Name: Cancel

TBl1.Tooltip:
Contains gear upgrades for the Guns: Tychus, Crooked Sam, and Sirius.

Enables:
- Crooked Sam from Joeyray's Bar
- Sirius from Joeyray's Bar
TBl1.Name: Build Gunslingers' Hideout

TBl1.Tooltip:
Contains upgrades for Tychus, his Outlaws, and the Odin.

Enables:
- Auto-Turrets from SCVs
TBl1.Name: Build Engineering Bay

TBl1.Tooltip:
A hideout for premier Outlaws.

Enables:
- Recruit Outlaw
- Revive Outlaw
TBl1.Name: Build Joeyray's Bar

TBl1.Tooltip:
Contains gear upgrades for the Fixers: Vega, Nux, and Lt. Nikara.

Enables:
- Vega from Joeyray's Bar
- Nux from Joeyray's Bar
- Lt. Nikara from Joeyray's Bar
TBl1.Name: Build Fixers' Safehouse

TBl1.Tooltip:
Automated defensive structure. Auto-Turrets can be salvaged.

Can attack ground and air units.
Detector
TBl1.Name: Build Auto-Turret

TBl1.Tooltip:
Contains gear upgrades for the Muscle: Blaze, Cannonball, and Rattlesnake.

Enables:
- Blaze from Joeyray's Bar
- Cannonball from Joeyray's Bar
- Rattlesnake from Joeyray's Bar
TBl1.Name: Build Muscle Armory

TBl1.Tooltip: Transport platform. Can instantly transport Tychus' combat units in the target area to a targeted location, healing and cloaking them on drop-off.
TBl1.Name: Build Medivac Platform
